title: Activision Blizzard 's net income/loss from 2005 to 2018
yAxis: Net income in million U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Net income in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2012 to 2008.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2008 to 2005.
Additionally, the next significant trend is extremely negative which exists from 2018 to 2016.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2016 to 2014.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2014 to 2012.
gold: This statistic shows the annual net income/loss of Activision Blizzard worldwide from 2005 to 2018 . In 2018 , Activision Blizzard 's net income amounted to 1.8 billion U.S. dollars .
